title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time Remake Incoming! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.10.20
description:
Blessing and Tim discuss Ubisoft Forward and an incoming announcement of Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:00 - Housekeeping
We are Live reacting to the latest Ubisoft Forward at noon today right here
AFTER THAT We’re doing a HUGE sponsored Predator: Hunting Grounds stream TODAY. Catch us playing for FOUR HOURS starting at 1 pm PT today on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames.
Hey guys, we heard from some of you that the code we mentioned for Bespoke Post a couple weeks back wasn’t working, and wanted to let you know that it has been fixed! So go http://boxofawesome.com and enter code GAMES at checkout to help support the show and get 20% off your order
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Tom Bock, & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:04:40 - Prince of Persia remake is Sands of Time - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:12:23 - Is the Scott Pilgrim game coming back? - Darryn Bonthuys @ Gamespot
00:14:10 - How can I (a fan of Scott Pilgrim) support the franchise I love while being vocal about Ubisoft 's iffy practices? - Best Friends Q:Oliver
00:15:20 - How do we balance these two sides of this coin? - Best Friends Q:TheSheepWhisper
00:25:45 - Xbox Game Pass for PC is doubling its price - Taylor Lyles @ The Verge
00:27:00- Is any slight increase to prices for, and in video games always going to be met with such aggressiveness? - Best Friends: Jeff L from Phoenix
00:36:30 -  NZXT BLD
00:36:15 - The GG App
00:40:00 - Epic V Apple Update: Apple goes on the full offensive - Alex Calvin @ GiBiz
00:42:30 - No More Heroes has been delayed - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:43:03 - Out today
00:44:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Greg
